name: Symmetry (itch) (Syntho64)
description: Hello! im a 13 year old who has been coding for a year now and this is my first project. it is a game i am making in unity and i hope you will enjoy. for more info email me at syntho6964@gmail.com or if you have any ideas. this game is not finished at all and this is only a prototype so expect many many updates for some time. in the mean while enjoy! the main premise of the game is to switch between the two characters (who are named Kenny and Stanley if you are curious) and complete puzzles. CONTROLS: WASD:moves Kenny UPDOWNLEFTRIGHT: moves Stanley SPACE: jump E: interact Z:crouch. BE WARNED this game is not at all finished and i just want your opinion on it so far. please dont send hate but i am open to criticism. i will update this game constantly so keep coming back for more! Thank you for playing.
